mapper.insert: insert into PRDT_POST_TB( PP_SQ_PK, PP_TITLE, PRDT_ST_NM_PK, PP_BODY, DLVR_CHRG_NM_PK, PP_SAVING_MILEAGE_PERCENT, MEM_EMAIL_PK, PP_REPORTING_DT, PP_FIN_MODIF_DT, PCI_SQ_PK )values( PRDT_POST_TB_SEQ.nextval, #{PP_TITLE}, #{PRDT_ST_NM_PK}, #{PP_BODY}, #{DLVR_CHRG_NM_PK}, #{PP_SAVING_MILEAGE_PERCENT}, #{MEM_EMAIL_PK}, sysdate, sysdate, #{PCI_SQ_PK} )
